name: Bug Defender (itch) (bembrooks)
description:
An evil hoard of robots have invaded carapace valley, and it's up to you to stop them!

This project was created as a part of a course on learning unity 2D, and is an endless top-down shooter. Code, art assets and sound effects were created by me.

Song is Force Field by Of Far Different Nature.

Controls:

Arrow keys – Move
Hold Z – Fire
